00023 const int MatrixIndexBase = 1; 
00024 const int VectorIndexBase = 1; 
00025 const int MatrixRowsIndex = 1; 
00026 const int MatrixColsIndex = 2; 
00027 typedef CAMdoubleMatrix Matrix; 
00028 typedef CAMdoubleVector Vector; 
00034 inline Matrix eye(int _rowColumns)
00035 {
00036     Matrix eyeOutput(_rowColumns,_rowColumns);
00037     eyeOutput.setToValue(0.0);
00038     for(int ii = MatrixIndexBase;ii < _rowColumns + MatrixIndexBase; ++ii)
00039         eyeOutput(ii,ii) = 1.0;
00040     return eyeOutput;
00041 }

00047 inline double trace(const Matrix &_inMatrix)
00048 {
00049     double Sum = 0;
00050     for(int ii = MatrixIndexBase;ii < _inMatrix[MatrixRowsIndex].getIndexCount() + MatrixIndexBase; ++ii)
00051         Sum += _inMatrix(ii,ii);
00052     return Sum;
00053 }
00054 
00060 inline double norm2(const Vector &_inVector)
00061 {
00062     double Sum = 0;
00063     for(int ii = VectorIndexBase;ii < _inVector.getIndexCount() + VectorIndexBase; ++ii)
00064         Sum += _inVector(ii) * _inVector(ii);
00065     return sqrt(Sum);
00066 }
00067 
00072 inline void normalize(Vector &_inVector)
00073 {
00074     _inVector /= norm2(_inVector);
00075     return;
00076 }
00077 
00083 inline double normInf(const Vector &_inVector)
00084 {
00085     return _inVector.maxAbs();
00086 }

00102 inline Matrix skew(const Vector &_inVector)
00103 {
00104     Matrix Rout(3,3);
00105     Rout.setToValue(0.0);
00106     Rout(MatrixIndexBase+0,MatrixIndexBase+1) =
00107         -_inVector(VectorIndexBase+2);
00108     Rout(MatrixIndexBase+0,MatrixIndexBase+2) =
00109         _inVector(VectorIndexBase+1);
00110     Rout(MatrixIndexBase+1,MatrixIndexBase+0) =
00111         _inVector(VectorIndexBase+2);
00112     Rout(MatrixIndexBase+1,MatrixIndexBase+2) =
00113         -_inVector(VectorIndexBase+0);
00114     Rout(MatrixIndexBase+2,MatrixIndexBase+0) =
00115         -_inVector(VectorIndexBase+1);
00116     Rout(MatrixIndexBase+2,MatrixIndexBase+1) =
00117         _inVector(VectorIndexBase+0);
00118     return Rout;
00119 }

00127 inline Vector crossP(const Vector &_v1, const Vector &_v2)
00128 {
00129     return skew(_v1) * _v2;
00130 }
